author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10000928

Compete like the pros in MX vs ATV Legends on 12 official tracks from the 2025 AMA Pro Motocross Championship, including the legendary Loretta Lynn’s!

Also included are 18 thrilling bonus events featuring cross-country courses, freestyle challenges, waypoint races, and even pit bike circuits!

New tracks and events will unlock gradually from August through October 2025 - Dominate the dirt!

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #MXvsATV #legendsaremade
title: MX vs ATV Legends - 2025 AMA Pro Motocross Championship Release Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10014853/

BrokenLore: DON'T WATCH is a psychological horror game from the BrokenLore series.
Available NOW

In the game, you play as Shinji, a hikikomori confined to a 6-square-meter Tokyo apartment.
But something is watching, and it’s getting closer.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #brokenlore
title: BrokenLore: Don't Watch - Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
BrokenLore: LOW is a psychological horror game set in the beautiful and mysterious Japanese village of Kirisame Mura, where the ancient legend of the Gashadokuro, a giant skeleton from Japanese folklore, still lingers.

Naomi Montgomery arrives in Kirisame Mura for a major professional opportunity that could jumpstart her music career. But instead of success, she finds herself facing sinister presences and uncovering the cursed past that haunts the village.

The game, enriched by original statues from Italian sculptor Bruno Lucchi, blends realistic visuals with stylized low-poly sequences, and was developed in consultation with a psychologist to ensure genuine emotional depth.

Hideki: “Time flows in its own way in Kirisame Mura.”

#ps5 #ps5games 

May contain content inappropriate for children. Visit http://www.esrb.org for rating information.
title: BrokenLore: LOW - Official Trailer | PS5 Games
